tool_description: API for accessing read-only data from 4chan.
title: 4chan API

api_list.name: Boards
api_list.description: Get the list of all boards and their attributes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://a.4cdn.org/boards.json"
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Thread List
api_list.description: Get the list of all threads on a board and their attributes.

required_parameters.name: board
required_parameters.description: The board to retrieve threads from

api_list.code:
import requests

url = f"https://a.4cdn.org/{board}/threads.json"
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Thread
api_list.description: Retrieve the full content of a specific thread.

required_parameters.name: board
required_parameters.description: The board the thread is located on

api_list.code:
import requests

url = f"https://a.4cdn.org/{board}/thread/{thread_id}.json"
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())
